apis.name: DoubleClick
apis.description: The DoubleClick for Advertisers (DFA) API enables you to manage your DFA account using SOAP calls. DFA is used to create and organize campaigns consisting of hundreds or thousands of graphic ads, to serve these ads to specific websites, and to generate a variety of reports tracking cost, impressions, and clickthroughs. Use the API to automate recurring or repetitive tasks in your account, such as bulk uploads or modifications.
